text: Service is top notch. Generous to top up soup. My son n daughter love the taste of soup. You tiao is freshly fried. Ingredients are fresh too. Price is reasonably affordable.

Came for the 2nd time but the pig vinegar trotter is getting worst as there is no meat at all. Mostly 90% is bone, some with the skin and the jelly jelly things or we call it the fats?

We order a big pot for 2 pax. When we can't find any meat. We order one small pot asking for more meat and told the guy that we don't eat the skin and fat. End up the small pot only have 2pcs of meat ğŸ˜…

Should have some meat for us who don't eat fats ğŸ˜…

Never recommend. Not worth it.
Malaysia taste with Malaysia price. Lots of meat and ingredients in a $6.50 clay pot Bak Kut Teh.
Tried their vinegar pig trotter (small) , taste is good. Recommended ğŸ‘ğŸ˜‹

Now Dongbei Cuihua (Charcoal Copper Hot Pot) is very delicious. The fresh ingredients are not expensive and the price is less than 15 per person. There are also tiger shrimps, shrimp shrimps, handmade meatballs, etc. which are worth tryingğŸ‘
